director.name: 米洛什·拉迪沃耶维奇 Milos 'Misa' Radivojevic

introduction: A romantically imagined interview intended for a student's magazine completely changed the lives of two people, a beautiful student-girl Una, and a respectable professor. She is bright and intelligent, but not fit for the complicated relations, while the professor is a man whose lectures on mass media are the most popular at the university. But, his thesis was not approved in bureaucracy circles of the university. Vice dean of the university uses Una to get to professor. So an innocent interview turns into a file of life, philosophical and ideological attitudes of controversial professor, and then into a malicious report of his life, actions, and manners. Screening of the synonymous Momo Kapor's novel.http://www.testament-films.co.yu/odbacen/misa%20radivojevic%20bio_eng.htmlMILOS "MISA" RADIVOJEVIC was born in Cacak on November 3, 1939. Completed degree in film directing at the Faculty of Dramatic Arts in Belgrade, in 1966 in the first generation of Professor Aleksandar Sasa Petrovic. Received numerous domestic and international awards for his work, such as:Medal Golden Lion (Venice Film Festival, 1970.) – Bube u glaviSilver Mermaid & Roberto Paolela (Naples, 1975.) – TestamentBronze Palm (Valencia, 1989.) – ?avkaLokarno, 1979. - KvarInternational Film Guide, 1980. on the Top Ten list – Kvar/BREAKDOWN/Special screening of "Bez" and "Kvar" at the Hamburg Film Festival, by the invitation from Ronald Holowvey and Reinahardt Hauf.
